column5: Hi all, I live in northern michigan and am looking into going on additional trip into canada for a long weekend, looking to be within about 3-4 hours of the sault, any suggestions? I know there are good michigan lakes and I do fish in that area, I'm sure I'll get blasted for wanting to go north, any thoughts are appreciated though.Thanks, Joe

Just about every lake around Wawa has good Walleye action. I worked there for a couple of years and the fishing is pretty good. Nothing compaired to where I live now but you can't go wrong.Wawa is about -2hrs from St. Sault Marie Ontario.
